title: Watch a tiny marine ‘wormlet’ slurp the guts out of living prey
content: Tiny marine worm larvae have a survival secret: they turn into carnivores, devouring microscopic crustaceans and other prey living in plankton.
description: Tiny marine worm larvae have a survival secret: they turn into carnivores, devouring microscopic crustaceans and other prey living in plankton.
